name: Seeds Of The Universe
description:
Grow your solar system back from the seeds of the Universe.  Meet strange Aliens and encounter unfortunate puns! Encounter planet gods and discover cool green frogs!

Controls: 

  • WASD (Move)
  •  Space (Interact)
